As The Blazing Lords enters, choose Hector route, Lyn route or Eliwood route.
[i]Hector route[/i] – When a creature you control enters, surveil 1.
[i]Lyn route[/i] – The first creature spell you cast each turn costs {2} less to cast.
[i]Eliwood route[/i] – Creatures you control get +1/+1.
{G}{U}{R}: Choose an additional route.
